name: Xunzi (Seek Chinese Characters)
description:
Xunzi (Seek Chinese Characters) Summary:
  • You will play in the role of an ancient chinese scholar and do calligraphy by covering the road with ink.
  • It's a mini game that produced in Global Game Jam 2021. (Lost and Found)
Control:
  • Hold W/S/A/D to steer the character.
  • Press Esc to turn on the pause menu.
Credit:
  • Game Design by Chacz, Polonius
  • Programming by 陈后全, 大发明家
  • Visuals by Fisher, 佩
  • Sound Design by Sjaved

   Made with Unity | Powered By Wwise.

Contact:

   jasperchen.sh@foxmail.com

Please note that the game can't run on Windows 7.
